data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Lalitpur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lalitpur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Lalitpur who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Lalitpur a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Lalitpur, Uttar Pradesh, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, I pray that the Brahmin Sawaria people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Brahmin Sawaria people know you.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Lalitpur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Lalitpur, Uttar Pradesh, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Lalitpur, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 1,221,600.

We estimate Lalitpur has 13,438 people who might know Jesus, 14,822 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,193,340 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Lalitpur, Uttar Pradesh, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.
